ctaHomepage.title: Get in touch
ctaHomepage.bodyCopy: Why not get in touch using my contact form below, leave a number or email address and I'll be in touch soon! Alternatively give me a call or send me an email directly.

success.title: Message sent!
success.message: Thanks for getting in touch, I'll be in contact soon

error.title: Something went wrong
error.message: Sorry! There's been a problem at our end and your form hasn't been sent, please try again or get in touch via phone or email.
